text: 'iina tatubuu watastaghfiruu yunzil allah ealaykum almatar ghzyrana mttabeana, wykthr 'amwalukum wa'awladakum, wyjel lakum hadayiq taneamwn bithimariha wajimaliha, wayajeal lakum al'anhar alty tusqun minha zareakum wamawashikum. malakum -'ayaha alqawma- la takhafun eizmat allah wasultaniha, waqad khalaqakum fi 'atwar mutadarijatin: nutfat thuma ealaqat thuma mudghat thuma ezamana wlhmana? 'alam tanzuruu kayf khalaq allah sabe samawat mutatabiqat baeduha fawq baedan, wajaeal alqamar fi hadhih alsamawat nwrana, wajaeal alshams msbahana mdyyana yastadi' bih 'ahl al'ardi?
